parameters.description: Search for videos on YouTube. You can also use the Boolean NOT (-) and OR (|) operators to exclude videos or to find videos that are associated with one of several search terms.
parameters.name: q

parameters.description: It restricts your search to only retrieve a particular type of resource, video, channel, or playlist
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Specifies the method that will be used to order: relevance,date,rating,title,videoCount, or viewCount
parameters.name: order

parameters.description: Indicates whether the search results should include restricted content as well as standard content.
parameters.name: safeSearch

parameters.description: Indicates whether the video search results should be filtered based on whether they have captions. If you specify a value for this parameter, you must also set the type parameter's value to video.
parameters.name: videoCaption

parameters.description: Lets you restrict a search to only retrieve 2D or 3D videos. You must also set the type parameter's value to video.
parameters.name: videoDimension

parameters.description: Lets you restrict a search to only include either high definition (HD) or standard definition (SD) videos. You must also set the type parameter's value to video.
parameters.name: videoDefinition

parameters.description: Filters video search results based on their duration, long, medium, or short. You must also set the type parameter's value to video.
parameters.name: videoDuration

parameters.description: Lets you to restrict a search to only videos that can be embedded into a webpage. You must also set the type parameter's value to video.
parameters.name: videoEmbeddable

parameters.description: Filters search results to only include videos with a particular license. You must also set the type parameter's value to video.
parameters.name: videoLicense

responses.description: The title of the search result.
responses.name: Title

responses.description: A description of the search result.
responses.name: Description

responses.description: The creation date and time of the resource that the search result identifies
responses.name: Published At

responses.description: The title of the channel that published the resource that the search result identifies.
responses.name: Channel Title

responses.description: The value that YouTube uses to uniquely identify the channel that published the resource that the search result identifies.
responses.name: Channel Id

responses.description: Thumbnail images associated with the search result.
responses.name: Thumbnails URL
